QuestData.Title: The Die is Cast
QuestData.Description: Thanks to your efforts the temple is safe, for now.$b$bBut the Tears of Elune are stolen and Shaladrassil, the world tree that once protected this land, is now an instrument in the hands of our enemy. The Emerald Dream itself is being overrun by Nightmare.$b$bThe hearts of our people falter, their faith tested like never before. Return to Ysera with my report, $n, such as it is.$b$bI shall plead with Elune with what time I have left here. May we somehow yet prevail.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak with Ysera at the Grove of Cenarius.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Speak with Ysera at the Grove of Cenarius.
QuestData.RewardText: This is dire news indeed, $n.$b$bDraw upon your courage now, friend, for Azeroth needs her heroes more than ever before.
